dcterms:creator: H. Schafer
E. Santana
A. Haden

dcterms:description: The Comma2k19 dataset contains various AV sensor data collected from a vehicle driven for 33 hours over 2019 segments on the US-280 highway in California, including measurements from GNSS, Control Area Network (CAN), and Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU) sensors.
dcterms:title: Comma2k19
